name: Document.links
description: The links read-only property of the Document interface returns a collection of all area elements and a elements in a document with a value for the href attribute.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'Document.links' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 HTML Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'document.links' in the 'Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 HTML Specification' specification.
